alert.note: Alert for Appling; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn; Jeff Davis; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GLYNN...CENTRAL WAYNE...NORTHEASTERN JEFF DAVIS AND NORTHERN APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hazlehurst to near Cox. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jesup, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Graham, Surrency, Gardi, Plant Hatch, Odum, Doctortown, and Mount Pleasant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
